alert.note: Alert for Kimball (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 3:55PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Kimball County through 330 PM MDT... At 255 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Kimball, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kimball and Dix. This includes Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 18 and 35. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for the Panhandle of Nebraska.
